prompt:
Below is an instruction that describes a task, paired with an input that provides candidate details and a target job.
Write a professional, ATS-friendly resume tailored to the target role.

First, produce a concise 2–4 bullet **Plan** that lists the sections and focus points you will include (e.g., highlight leadership, quantify achievements, include keywords from job description). Do not reveal internal chain-of-thought — keep the plan explicit and short.

Then generate the resume. Use clear section headers (Summary, Experience, Education, Skills, Projects/Certs as applicable). For experience bullets, use the STAR/impact style (situation/task → action → measurable result) and include quantifiable metrics where possible. Tailor language and keywords to the target job.

### Candidate details / Job target:
Position: 1c Developer
More info: Worked on a mobile application for tracking trips
Looking For: None
Highlights: None
Primary Keyword: Other

### Additional instructions (tone, length, must-include keywords, formatting notes):
Tone: professional, one-page, include relevant keywords.
- Identify key skills from the candidate's past roles.
- Match these skills to the job description keywords.
- Prioritize experiences that show measurable achievements.

### Output format:
Plan:
- <short bullet 1>
- <short bullet 2>

Resume:
[Use sections: Summary, Experience (most recent first), Education, Skills, Projects/Certifications, Additional information (optional)]
response: Worked on a mobile application for tracking trips

Looking For: In terms of the nature of the Customer Support position, I am looking for a high level role, in order to ensure my personal development.
I do not search for L1 support position.

Also, I need an office.
Highlights: thousands of resolved problems, also, thousands of happy Users.

prompt:

First, produce a concise 2–4 bullet **Plan** that lists the sections and focus points you will include (e.g., highlight leadership, quantify achievements, include keywords from job description). Do not reveal internal chain-of-thought — keep the plan explicit and short.

For experience bullets, use the STAR/impact style (situation/task → action → measurable result) and include quantifiable metrics where possible. Tailor language and keywords to the target job.

### Candidate details / Job target:
Position: 1st line IT support
More info: A competent IT support professional with a proven track record of providing specialist technical and helpdesk support. Extensive experience of working in the front line helping Provided phone and remote desktop support to end-users. Possessing excellent client facing skills, natural problem solving and analytical skills and able to contribute to the development of best practice, procedures and policies within a company. Currently looking for a position to increase knowledge and learn.

Supporting all desktop IT Services including desktop PCs, laptops, office printing. Manage routine maintenance jobs, ensure that they are secure & reliable. Collaborating closely with other IT team members. Responding to queries in a timely and accurate manner and resolving queries to the user’s satisfaction.

Duties at current job:
Responsible for diagnosing & resolving hardware, software & end users problems.

Acting as the first point of contact for all IT & technical queries.

Developing the infrastructure and systems to meet the company’s needs.

Working within a TCP/IP network environment, including DHCP, DNS and Ethernet.

Tracking and releasing important emails from quarantine in Cisco IronPort.

Administration of Kaspersky Security Center

Cisco Unified Call Manager – multiple operations with corporate phones.

Traffic flow and URL block for users within the company via Palo Alto firewall.

Provide secondary support for LAN administration.

In-depth knowledge of Microsoft Windows client operating systems, XP, Vista /Windows 7/10 &Microsoft Office

Create users accounts in AD and assign them to specific security groups.

Managing Windows Server Update Services and keeping track of full installation and troubleshooting of updates on PC, Laptops and Servers.
Looking For: None
Highlights: Migration of workstations from Windows 7 to 10 (1809), Migration of 15 Linux servers from Open SUSE to RHEL 7, writing procedures to fill the specific requests,
Primary Keyword: Support

### Additional instructions (tone, length, must-include keywords, formatting notes):
Tone: professional, one-page, include relevant keywords.
- Identify key skills from the candidate's past roles.
- Match these skills to the job description keywords.
- Prioritize experiences that show measurable achievements.

### Output format:
Plan:
- <short bullet 1>
- <short bullet 2>

Resume:
[Use sections: Summary, Experience (most recent first), Education, Skills, Projects/Certifications, Additional information (optional)]
response:
Migration of workstations from Windows 7 to 10 (1809), Migration of 15 Linux servers from Open SUSE to RHEL 7, writing procedures to fill the specific requests,

Possessing excellent client facing skills, natural problem solving and analytical skills and able to contribute to the development of best practice, procedures and policies within a company.
